# compositionTime

**Instance Property**

The time in the video composition corresponding to the frame being processed.

## Declaration

```swift
let compositionTime: CMTime
```

## Inspecting the parameters

- **renderSize**: The width and height, in pixels, of the frame being processed.
- **sourceImage**: The current video frame image.

items.description: The width and height, in pixels, of the frame being processed.
